q: Lib Dem energy secretary, went further, suggesting that the Lib Dems deserved`` massive congratulation'' for their performance. Asked by the BBC if he was disappointed by the defeat, Mr Chris Huhne replied: Everyone knows that in by-elections, government parties get hammered. Here is a government party that has put up its share of the vote. I'm amazed that you think this should be anything other a massive congratulation. `` By 2015, I hope that the people of Oldham and Saddleworth will see, like everyone else in the country, that the difficult choices we made were the right ones and that Britain is in

Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly,'' Larry Page said. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him The change in command overshadowed Google's fourth-quarter earnings, which soared past analysts' estimates as the company cranked up its Internet marketing machine during the holiday shopping season. last week said he will step down as chief executive officer in favor of Google co-founder Larry Page to become executive chairman, is`` actually committed to Google,'' he told reporters at the Digital-Life-Design conference in Munich. How long are you committed to doing what you're doing? As long as it's exciting, he said in response to a question about his plans.
